tool.name: Statistics on presence-absence

param.name: variable1
param.label: Select a column containing numerical values (such as the abundance)

param.name: species
param.label: Select the column of the x-axis variable for dispersion plot and to see the correlation between absences

tool.help:
==================================================================== Calculate the Median, the dispersion and correlation between absence ====================================================================
**What it does** This tool computes:
- The median of an numerical value (like the abundance) and shows the dispersion of this value according to a variable such as sites or species or others
- If there is a correlation among species using the presence of zeros in a numerical value
**Input description** A tabular file with observation data. Must at least contain two columns which associate a numerical value with another variable.
+-------------+------------+---------------+-------------+ | number | time | species.code | location | +=============+============+===============+=============+ | 2 | date | speciesID | site | +-------------+------------+---------------+-------------+ | ... | ... | ... | ... | +-------------+------------+---------------+-------------+
**Output** Two png files:
- Two graphics one under the other with one for the median and one for the dispersion like the image underneath
- One graphic, a corrplot.
.. image::test_bbs.png
